original_text: Then I heard the sound of his words, and as I heard the sound of his words, I fell on my face in deep sleep with my face to the ground.
korean_text: 내가 그의 음성을 들었는데 그의 음성을 들을 때에 내가 얼굴을 땅에 대고 깊이 잠들었느니라

sentences.original_text: Then I heard the sound of his words
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 내가 그의 말씀 소리를 들었고

sentences.original_text: as I heard the sound of his words
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그의 말씀 소리를 들을 때에

sentences.original_text: with my face to the ground
